page.title: 03Trumpington Church
page.content:
Founded in 1220 AD, Trumpington church is a pleasant aspect of Trumpington. We did not see the present vicar, Thomas Young MA.
There are many interresting factors of this church, for instance the tomb of{Sir Rodger de Trumpington,}who was a valiant knight (possibly the bearer of one of the Coeur de Leons in the crusades) lies there and above his tomb is a brass rubbing. Another was the founder of the present{Post {Office.
The church itself is an old stone building with a high bell tower, with a fully functional bell, dating back to 1450 AD. There is some magnificent stained glass and a working organ set into the bell tower.
